All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Airport
The Airport class that represents an airport entity with details such as ID, name, city and country.
AirportController
Controller class to implement airport API endpoints and handle requests.
AirportInUseException
Exception to be thrown when a given airport cannot be found.
AirportNotFoundException
Exception to be thrown when a given airport cannot be found.
AirportRepository
The AirportRepository interface defines the operations for managing Airports in the system.
AirportService
Service class to manage airport objects
ApiError
Record to be returned in place of just a string when exceptions occur.
Arrival
 
Data
 
Departure
 
Destination
The Destination class the represents an destination entity with details such as ID, city, country, climate, tags and Airports.
DestinationRepository
The DestinationRepository interface defines the operations for managing Destinations in the system.
ExternalFlightApiResponse
 
ExternalFlightController
Controller method that fetches the data from an external API.
ExternalFlightService
This class deals with fetching flights from an external API (Aviation Stack) and parses the response into an ExternalFlightApiResponse object.
Flight
The Flight class the represents flight entity with details such as ID, departureAirport, arrivalAirport, price and departureDate.
FlightController
Controller class to implement flights API endpoints and handle requests.
FlightNotFoundException
Exception to be thrown when a given airport cannot be found.
FlightRepository
The FlightRepository interface defines the operations for managing Flights in the system.
FlightService
Service class to manage flight objects
FlightsUtilityClass
Class containing utility methods.
FrugalflyerApplication
Main point of entry for application.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Class that handles exceptions for mulitple controllers across the application.
InvalidClimateStringException
Exception to be thrown when a given climate cannot be found.
InvalidDateException
Exception to be thrown when a given date is invalid.
InvalidNumberException
Exception to be thrown when a given nnumber is out of bounds.
InvalidTagStringException
Exception to be thrown when a given tag string cannot be found.
